statements: SELECT * FROM blueprints WHERE id = 1;
SELECT blueprint_name, architect_name FROM blueprints WHERE creation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blueprints WHERE architect_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT id, floor_plan FROM blueprints WHERE architect_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT blueprint_name, creation_date FROM blueprints ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM blueprints WHERE architect_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT blueprint_name, architect_name FROM blueprints WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blueprints WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, blueprint_name, creation_date FROM blueprints WHERE architect_name LIKE '%Construction%';
SELECT * FROM blueprints ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM categories;
SELECT category_name FROM categories;
SELECT blueprint_name, blueprint_content FROM blueprints WHERE blueprint_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 5;
SELECT blueprint_name, blueprint_id FROM blueprints ORDER BY blueprint_id DESC;
SELECT blueprint_name, blueprint_content FROM blueprints WHERE blueprint_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT blueprint_name, category_name FROM blueprints JOIN categories ON blueprints.blueprint_id = categories.category_id WHERE blueprint_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY category_name, blueprint_name;
SELECT * FROM blueprints WHERE blueprint_name LIKE 'A%' AND LENGTH(blueprint_name) > 5;
SELECT blueprint_id, category_name FROM blueprints JOIN categories ON blueprints.blueprint_id = categories.category_id WHERE blueprint_id = 2;
SELECT id, blueprint_name, architect_name, creation_date FROM blueprints;
SELECT * FROM rooms ORDER BY room_size DESC;
SELECT room_name, room_type FROM rooms WHERE room_size > 100;
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM blueprints b JOIN materials m ON b.id = m.material_id;
SELECT blueprint_name, architect_name, creation_date FROM blueprints;
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE room_type = 'Kitchen';
SELECT blueprint_name, creation_date FROM blueprints WHERE architect_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT room_name, room_size, room_type FROM rooms WHERE room_size > 100 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, price, quantity FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 123 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM blueprint_documents;
SELECT document_name, author_name FROM blueprint_documents WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT document_name, created_at FROM blueprint_documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT bv.version_number, bd.document_name, bv.is_latest_version FROM blueprint_versions bv JOIN blueprint_documents bd ON bv.document_id = bd.id WHERE bv.is_latest_version = TRUE;
SELECT bc.category_name, COUNT(bt.tag_id) AS tag_count FROM blueprint_categories bc LEFT JOIN blueprint_tags bt ON bc.category_id = bt.tag_id GROUP BY bc.category_name ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM blueprint_documents;
SELECT document_name, author_name, created_at FROM blueprint_documents WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT bd.document_name, bv.version_number, bv.description FROM blueprint_documents bd JOIN blueprint_versions bv ON bd.id = bv.document_id;
SELECT bc.category_name, bt.tag_name FROM blueprint_categories bc, blueprint_tags bt;
SELECT * FROM blueprint_versions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT blueprint_name, architect_name FROM blueprint_1;
SELECT category, scale, status FROM blueprint_2;
SELECT plot_number, location FROM blueprint_3;
SELECT architect_name, experience_years, specialization FROM blueprint_4;
SELECT project_id, date_started FROM blueprint_5;
SELECT * FROM blueprint_1;
SELECT blueprint_name, architect_name FROM blueprint_1 WHERE blueprint_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM blueprint_3 ORDER BY land_area DESC;
SELECT architect_name, specialization FROM blueprint_4 WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM blueprint_5 WHERE date_started BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
